title: Channel 4 strikes advertising deal with Sky
text:
Great British Bake Off viewers will be targeted by advertisers based on their location and financial profile under a new partnership between Channel 4 and Sky that could increase pressure on ITV to follow suit.

The deal covers the entire Channel 4 schedule, as well as BT Sport and UKTV channels such as Dave, for which the state-owned broadcaster acts as advertising salesperson.

Once the technical set-up is completed, it means that millions of households watching Channel 4 through a Sky or Virgin Media set-top box will be served up different advertising based on profiles built by AdSmart.

Sky offers advertisers 900 attributes to choose from, including location, household wealth, purchasing behaviour...
